turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I need to order from Peet's Coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay great.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: There should be one in studio today.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: to Los Angeles.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, I'll place the order with Studios 8 in Los Angeles.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Let me get four medium frappuccinos.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm not finding frapaccinos on the Peets menu.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: caramel macchiatos.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: alright you wanted 4 caramel machiatos right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great did you want any syrups with those?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of milk did you want to use?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Whole milk for two of them and then two of them with skimmed milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay so that's 2 whole milk and 2 skim milk caramel macchiatos. Is that iced or regular?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: two ice, two regular.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright. I've placed the drink order with the Peets at Studio 8 and it will be ready soon. Your reciept will go to your phone via text.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Have a good day.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.
